refnamediv.refpurpose: Displays all combinations that have any of the objects specified as a member.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Displays all combinations that have any of the objects specified as a member.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the find command to display all combinations that refer to the specified object.

example.title: Display all combinations that refer to a specified object.

listitem.para: Lists all combinations that refer to shapea.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
